item.title: 6 Meme Coins in December 2024 That Could Lead the Next Crypto Boom
item.dc:creator: Oliver Dale
item.description:
In the ever-changing world of digital currencies, some playful tokens might be on the verge of igniting a significant surge. These coins, often born from internet humor, have the potential to capture widespread attention and drive market excitement. This article explores six such tokens that could be poised to make a notable impact in the [...]

The post 6 Meme Coins in December 2024 That Could Lead the Next Crypto Boom appeared first on Blockonomi.
item.content:encoded:
In the ever-changing world of digital currencies, some playful tokens might be on the verge of igniting a significant surge. These coins, often born from internet humor, have the potential to capture widespread attention and drive market excitement. This article explores six such tokens that could be poised to make a notable impact in the coming year.

Dominate the Field with XYZ: The Next Meme Coin Champion!

The game is on, and XYZ is leading the charge in the meme coin arena! This sensational all-sports meme token has hit the market with unstoppable momentum, knocking out weak competitors and scammy cryptos.

As it charges ahead, XYZ is set to deliver jaw-dropping gains, leaving the likes of BOME and WIF far behind. With eyes on a staggering 9,900% growth, XYZ is ready to claim the meme coin crown in the next crypto bull marathon!

Rule the game, cash in as the bets roll in

XYZ is the star player in XYZVerse â€“ the ultimate fusion of sports thrill and meme culture. This community-centered ecosystem is the perfect playground for crypto degens and sports fans alike.

Think back to Polymarket’s $1 billion trading volume during the US elections betting frenzy, and now, picture that on steroids with XYZVerse. With millions of sport bettors getting ready to jump in the action, opportunities for early investors in XYZ are really huge!

XYZ is currently undervalued, and with major listings on the way, presale participants stand to secure life-changing gains.

>>>Donâ€™t miss your shot at being part of the XYZ winning team!<<<

Shiba Inu (SHIB)

Shiba Inu (SHIB) began as a playful tribute to Dogecoin but has evolved into a cryptocurrency with bigger ambitions. Launched in August 2020 by the anonymous Ryoshi, SHIB operates on the Ethereum blockchain. This means it can tap into Ethereum’s vast network of decentralized applications. Starting with a whopping one quadrillion tokens, half were sent to Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin. This bold move built trust, and when Buterin donated a large portion to the India Covid Crypto Relief Fund and burned 40% of the total supply, SHIB grabbed the spotlight.

What makes SHIB stand out is its potential for real-world use. Unlike Dogecoin, which is mostly known for its meme status, SHIB’s Ethereum foundation allows it to support projects like ShibaSwap, its own decentralized exchange. There are also plans for an NFT platform and a system where holders can help decide the project’s future. In today’s market, where investors look for coins with practical applications, SHIB’s growing ecosystem could make it an attractive option. As cryptocurrencies evolve, those that offer more than just hype may thrive, and SHIB seems ready to take on that challenge.

Dogwifhat (WIF)

A new dog-themed meme coin has entered the crypto scene: Dogwifhat (WIF). Inspired by the viral Dogwifhat meme, WIF is gaining popularity for its fun and community-driven approach. Built on the Solana blockchain, it joins a pack of dog-themed tokens that have made waves in the crypto world. Meme coins like WIF are known for their viral nature, often spreading through social media and online communities.

What sets WIF apart is its base on Solana, a fast and scalable blockchain. This could give it an edge in terms of transaction speed and fees compared to other meme coins on slower networks. In the current market cycle, where there’s a growing interest in meme coins and community-led projects, WIF might catch the eye of crypto enthusiasts looking for the next big thing. Whether WIF will stand out in the crowded meme coin space remains to be seen, but its unique charm and the strength of its community might give it a fighting chance.

PEPE (PEPE)

PEPE is a new memecoin that pays tribute to Pepe the Frog, a popular internet meme created by Matt Furie in the early 2000s. Launched on Ethereum, PEPE has quickly gained attention by embracing the fun and simplicity of meme culture. With a no-tax policy and an upfront admission of its lack of utility, PEPE keeps things pure and simple. In late April to May 2023, PEPE’s value skyrocketed, reaching a market cap of $1.6 billion at one point. Early investors saw huge gains, and a strong community of fans rallied behind the coin. This surge sparked what some call a “memecoin season,” with other meme-inspired coins experiencing wild rides in value.

PEPE aims to join the ranks of other famous memecoins like Dogecoin and Shiba Inu. Its roadmap has three phases: getting listed on CoinMarketCap and trending on Twitter, securing listings on centralized exchanges, and finally, achieving “tier 1” exchange listings and a “meme takeover.” Whether PEPE looks attractive in the current market depends on one’s appetite for risk. The crypto market is known for its volatility, especially with memecoins that can pump and dump rapidly. As the Bitcoin halving approaches, many hope for a bull run that could lift coins like PEPE. While PEPE has captured the imagination of many, it’s important to stay informed in this unpredictable market.

Bonk (BONK)

Meet BONK, the memecoin that’s capturing attention on the Solana blockchain. With its charming Shiba Inu mascot, BONK aims to give power back to the community by shifting it away from big venture capital holders. It made headlines by soaring over 100% after getting listed on Coinbase. Half of its total supply was airdropped to participants in Solana’s NFT and DeFi projects, making it truly a coin for the people. By mid-December 2023, BONK had become the third-largest memecoin by market cap, enjoying a staggering year-to-date rise of over 10,000%.

Despite facing challenges like a large total supply and the ups and downs common in memecoins, BONK is carving out a notable place in the crypto world. Its integration into Solana’s growing ecosystem of decentralized apps sets it apart from other memecoins. The launch of BonkSwap, its own decentralized exchange, is a significant step forward. In the current market cycle, BONK’s blend of community focus and active development makes it an interesting option to watch. Compared to other coins, its rapid growth and strong community support highlight its potential in the ever-evolving cryptocurrency space.

SPX6900 (SPX)

In the ever-evolving world of cryptocurrencies, SPX6900 has emerged from internet culture as a playful yet ambitious contender. This meme token is on a bold mission to surpass the S&P 500 by targeting a colossal $69 trillion market cap. The idea is simple and humorous: if 6900 is greater than 500, then SPX6900 must be superior to any traditional financial instrument. This lighthearted logic has captured the imagination of a community that thrives on big numbers and even bigger aspirations.

While SPX6900 began as a meme, it’s riding the wave of a market that appreciates innovation and disruption. The token symbolizes a challenge to traditional finance, fueled by the belief that the digital economy can redefine wealth and investment. In the current market cycle, where investors are exploring beyond conventional assets, SPX6900 presents an intriguing, if not entirely serious, option. Its potential lies not just in numbers, but in the community and culture that support it. As similar meme tokens have seen substantial growth, SPX6900 could be attractive to those who enjoy the blend of humor and high-risk, high-reward investments.

Conclusion

While SHIB, WIF, PEPE, and BONK are promising, XYZVerse (XYZ) uniquely blends sports and meme culture, positioning it to lead the crypto boom in 2024.

You can find more information about XYZVersus (XYZ) here:

Site, Telegram, X

The post 6 Meme Coins in December 2024 That Could Lead the Next Crypto Boom appeared first on Blockonomi.

The post PENGU Left You Behind? These Next Memecoins Could Be Your Big Break! appeared first on Blockonomi.
item.content:encoded:
Missed the boat on that recent memecoin sensation? Fear not. A new lineup of quirky tokens is on the horizon, each with the potential to make a splash. Explore these emerging digital coins that could become the next big thing. They might just offer the breakthrough opportunity that’s been elusive until now.

The All-Sports Meme Token You Canâ€™t Afford to Bench!

XYZ is your exclusive VIP pass to a sports-driven, meme-fueled revolution. Think of it as the MVP of the XYZVerse ecosystem, where degens can score big off the growing demand for meme coins

Â Picture this: Polymarket hitting $1 billion in trading volume during the US presidential election â€“ now throw in the hype of meme coins and the thrill of sports betting. With millions of sports fans ready to hit the field and cash in the XYZVerse ecosystem is set to keep expanding â€“ and your rewards will slam dunk through the roof!

>>>XYZ presale is your first-quarter chance to get in before the mind-blowing explosion!<<<

In 2024, meme coins are the undisputed champions of the crypto world, and XYZ is set to crush the competition. With potential thousand-fold returns that will blow past the finish line, the presale plan draws a hefty 9,900% growth by the TGE. Forget about BOMEâ€™s 5,000% rise or WIFâ€™s 1,000% rally â€“ XYZ is here to outscore them all!

With upcoming listings on major CEX and DEX platforms, rock-solid defense in the form of audited smart contracts, and a fully vetted team, XYZ is already ahead of the game. The first-mover advantage is key here â€“ get in before the crowd storms the field, and youâ€™ll be sitting on way bigger returns!

>>Donâ€™t be left on the bench â€“ grab your XYZ tokens now and be part of the next massive crypto championship!<<

AVA Chiang Mai Night Safari (AVA)

AVA, the golden tiger cub from Thailand, is stealing hearts worldwide. With her striking golden coatâ€”a result of rare recessive genesâ€”she’s one of fewer than 100 golden tigers on the planet. Her adorable photos and videos are lighting up the internet, quickly making her the next viral sensation after Moo Deng the hippo.

But Ava’s charm isn’t just winning over animal lovers; she’s making waves in the crypto world too. The AVA Token, inspired by her growing fame, is a community-driven project catching the eye of investors during this altcoin season. With the recent success of tokens like MOODENG, which soared by 1,643% over the last three months, many are speculating that AVA could follow a similar path. Currently available on decentralized exchanges, the AVA Token presents an intriguing opportunity in today’s market. As we watch Ava grow, both in size and popularity, it’ll be exciting to see how far her namesake token can go in the crypto space.

Mr. Mayonnaise (MAYO)

Meet Mr. Mayonnaise, a three-year-old ragdoll cat whose harrowing ordeal has sparked a new movement in the crypto world. Found unresponsive under a neighbor’s car, his owners feared the worst. But a second hospital visit revealed the true culprit: a paralysis tick hidden deep in his luxurious fur. The tick’s venom left Mr. Mayonnaise unable to breathe on his own, requiring a ventilator and intensive care costing $9,000 a day. Against all odds, this resilient feline is fighting back, inspiring his community along the way.

Enter MAYO Token, a meme coin created in honor of Mr. Mayonnaise’s courageous battle. The idea is simple: if a tick bite can cost more than a car, it deserves its own currency. The token has quickly gained attention in the crypto space, capturing hearts and wallets alike. With its low market cap, MAYO Token presents an opportunity for early investors seeking the next big thing. Its emotionally charged story sets it apart from other meme coins, potentially boosting its appeal. In the current market cycle, where unique stories and community support drive value, MAYO Token looks like an attractive contender. Just as Mr. Mayonnaise is fighting back, MAYO Token could be poised to make its mark.

Conclusion

AVA and MAYO are promising, but XYZVerse (XYZ) stands out. It unites sports fans in a memecoin aiming for massive growth with a unique, community-driven ecosystem.

You can find more information about XYZVersus (XYZ) here:

Site, Telegram, X

The post PENGU Left You Behind? These Next Memecoins Could Be Your Big Break! appeared first on Blockonomi.

item.content:encoded:
Dogecoin’s recent decline has left investors searching for alternatives with stronger potential. Meanwhile, a new contender, DOGEN, has caught attention with a striking surge in value. The contrast between DOGE’s struggles and DOGEN’s explosive growth raises important questions about where the better opportunities lie. Could this emerging crypto star outshine the veteran?

DOGEN Rejoys Big Moment: Trumpâ€™s Victory Will Send It to the Moon

Guess who is going to join Elon Muskâ€™s moon mission soon?

DOGEN, the boldest meme coin for alpha males, is gearing up for take-off as Trump’s victory in the recent US election has the entire market euphoric about the prospects of cryptocurrencies, especially meme coins.

Donald and Elon are Best Buddies for Meme Coins

Donald Trumpâ€™s love for crypto is no secret â€” heâ€™s promised to make the U.S. the global crypto leader in his campaign. And joining him is none other than Elon Musk, the ultimate Dogecoin (DOGE) fan whoâ€™s backed the crypto movement and even aligned with Republicans earlier this year. With these two icons fueling the fire, meme coins are set for a wild ride!

DOGE Soars 130% in Just One Week! DOGEN will be the Next Star with 500% Surge

Following the US election results, Dogecoin (DOGE) has been on a steady rise: from $0.15 to $0.39 in just one week.

DOGEN follows the same upward trend, starting at $0.0003 and now trading at $0.0013, a staggering 333% leap.

With a total of 13 presale stages, DOGEN is set to rise to $0.0019 by the token generation event (TGE), which represents a 500% increase from its initial price.

Like it DOGE style? Grab Some DOGEN Now and Watch It Soars 500%

A Community-Driven Token with Referral Program

The backbone of DOGEN is its strong and engaged communityâ€”an energetic group of investors ready to seize the next big opportunity. With nearly $4,000,000 already raised, DOGEN has proven its appeal among crypto enthusiasts.

Adding to its allure is DOGENâ€™s unique multi-level referral program, which rewards community participation:

  • 7% in USDT from direct referrals
  • 2% from second-tier referrals
  • 1% from third-tier referrals

Wanna Surf this Bull Wave? Join the DOGEN Army!

Step into the winnerâ€™s circle with DOGENâ€”where elite investors get access to exclusive campaigns, epic perks, and top-tier deals.

Live the high life you deserve: luxury cars, stacks of cash, and unforgettable experiences await those who go all-in on DOGEN. Donâ€™t settle for ordinary when you can have it all!

Flex Hard, Earn Big â€“ DOGEN is Your Power Move!

Dogecoin: A Meme-Based Cryptocurrency with Growing Popularity

Dogecoin, launched in 2013, uses a Shiba Inu meme as its logo. It was created by Billy Marcus and Jackson Palmer as a playful take on cryptocurrency. Unlike Bitcoin, Dogecoin has no limit on supply, with 10,000 coins mined per minute. Initially dismissed as a joke, its popularity soared in 2021 due to social media and support from figures like Elon Musk. This pushed its market value past $50 billion, placing it among the top cryptocurrencies. Its appeal lies in its vibrant community and widespread adoption for tipping and donations. Whether it remains attractive depends on market trends, community strength, and its real-world uses evolving further.

Conclusion

DOGE and other meme tokens show limited short-term potential compared to DOGEN. Designed for those who value luxury and achievement, DOGEN stands out with an expected 700% growth before presale ends and possibilities for massive returns in this altcoin season. Inspired by past successes, it attracts leaders focused on dominating markets and offers exclusive perks for early supporters.

Site: https://dogen.meme/

Twitter: https://x.com/dogenmeme

Telegram: https://t.me/Dogen_Portal

The post DOGE Downtrend Sparks Questions â€“ Is DOGENâ€™s 50x Rally a Better Bet? appeared first on Blockonomi.

item.title: Ripple (XRP) Under $5 or Rexas Finance (RXS) Under $0.50? Which One Is the Better Investment?
item.dc:creator: Aiden
item.description:
Buying cryptocurrency can be exciting and nerve wracking, especially if you have to pick between popular coins like Ripple (XRP) and new projects like Rexas Finance. And each comes with its own set of opportunities and risks to enable the decision which depends on a variety of factors between individual investment strategy and market outlook. [...]

The post Ripple (XRP) Under $5 or Rexas Finance (RXS) Under $0.50? Which One Is the Better Investment? appeared first on Blockonomi.
item.content:encoded:
Buying cryptocurrency can be exciting and nerve wracking, especially if you have to pick between popular coins like Ripple (XRP) and new projects like Rexas Finance. And each comes with its own set of opportunities and risks to enable the decision which depends on a variety of factors between individual investment strategy and market outlook.

Crypto Whales Purchased RXS Token

Ripple’s (XRP) Momentum: Legal Wins, Banking Partnerships, and Potential for $10 Valuation

Ripple has been a significant player in the cryptocurrency world for a while now and it owes all of this to the focus it has put into blockchain technology that should make it an enabler for cross border payments. The highest price is reached at $2,35 and can fluctuate from it for up to $1.55, XRP trading volume for the past 24 hours is $242 370 209 worth. XRP is currently doing great in the past month, as it increased by an astounding 249.40%. An arduous battle against the SEC and market favourable conditions are what accounts for investor confidence, they say. But, we cannot forgo the real world benefit for the banking industry of XRP more than any other. However, its connection with prominent financial establishments keeps its name as a safer investment for those seeking to withdraw their capital on stability and growth. And why it can soon be worth $10, analysts suggest, is because of XRP’s transaction volume, which is already more than Ethereum, Solana and Bitcoin combined. A solid performance like this means that even if XRP may not be a top performer, it remains a cryptocurrency of choice for users looking for proven use cases with cryptocurrencies.

However, XRP’s potential for growth is impressive, and it’s important to think about whether it will offer returns similar to up and coming projects like Rexas Finance.

Rexas Finance (RXS): Revolutionizing Real-World Asset Tokenization with 400% Growth in Presale and $45 Price Prediction by 2025

Rexas Finance is a project that looks to tokenize real world assets (RWA), allowing users to have an opportunity to invest in illiquid assets, real estate, art, commodities etc. Meanwhile, RXS is in its presale phase as it grows from $0.03 to $0.150â€”a 400% growth within weeks. Over $28 million has been sold in the presale so far, pushing past its $33 million cap, a testament to the demand this new asset class has from both amateur and seasoned investors. What makes RXS unique is the ability to democratize investment opportunities into fractional ownership of high value assets. With the RWA market forecasted to explode, potentially to $16 trillion by 2030, Rexas Finance is well placed to capitalize on this market growth. The platform is audited recently by CertiK as well, which adds to investor confidence, assuring everyone that the platform is observing high security standards. This enthusiasm for RXS’s future performance is shared among analysts that project this stock could be priced at as much as $45 by Q4 2025. The potential for exponential growth is what makes RXS an appealing choice for the investor who is after high risk and high return.

Rexas Finance (RXS): A Promising Opportunity in Real-World Asset Tokenization with Significant Growth PotentialÂ 

Rexas Finance, however, offers a way in for those who are willing to take on more risk for a chance at potentially more reward. The tokenization of RWA is part of the project and fosters an impending market with wide expectations of potential growth. Yet, existing as a presale means that there are potential risks with the new projects that have these caveats as yet to completely become established in the market. The sentiment in the market is crucial for investment in cryptocurrencies. Investors have been Trades alert: Ripple a boost in trading volumes and price appreciation in the wake of its recent legal victories. On the contrary, Rexas Finance is a pioneer in its approach and experienced success with its community driven presale that attracted people looking to invest in the next big thing in crypto.

Looking ahead to 2025, both XRP and RXS have very good futures, though they appeal to two different types of investors. XRP is for those who want stability and steadiness in their cryptocurrency growth. On the other hand, investors who are more willing to assume substantial risk for potentially greater rewards may find Rexas Finance more appealing. What it really boils down to is personal investment strategies and goals. Ripple is a good Ripple to invest in with a few use cases established and a strong institutional backing. Recent performance suggests it can continue to grow steadily. Rexas Finance is an exciting opportunity in a burgeoning sector around real world asset tokenization. However, since RXS has already succeeded in making some impressive presale sales and projects some ambitious growth, early investors can expect substantial returns.

Website: https://rexas.com

Whitepaper: https://rexas.com/rexas-whitepaper.pdf

Twitter/X: https://x.com/rexasfinance

Telegram: https://t.me/rexasfinance

 

The post Ripple (XRP) Under $5 or Rexas Finance (RXS) Under $0.50? Which One Is the Better Investment? appeared first on Blockonomi.

item.title: Solana or Ethereum? Which Altcoin Is Better BUY as Market Take a Pause
item.dc:creator: Oliver Dale
item.description:
As the crypto market pauses, investors are considering whether Solana or Ethereum offers a better opportunity. ChangeNOW, a platform for exchanging cryptocurrency without registration, reports that transaction volumes for ETH and SOL have grown. Savvy investors and large holders concerned about the safety of their funds are using ChangeNOW. This increase suggests an accumulation phase, [...]

The post Solana or Ethereum? Which Altcoin Is Better BUY as Market Take a Pause appeared first on Blockonomi.
item.content:encoded:
As the crypto market pauses, investors are considering whether Solana or Ethereum offers a better opportunity. ChangeNOW, a platform for exchanging cryptocurrency without registration, reports that transaction volumes for ETH and SOL have grown. Savvy investors and large holders concerned about the safety of their funds are using ChangeNOW. This increase suggests an accumulation phase, indicating these coins may grow in the future.

Ethereum’s Price Movement Hints at Potential Growth

Ethereum is currently trading between $3648 and $4137. Over the past month, its price has risen by about 5%. The nearest resistance level is at $4318, and if this is surpassed, the next target could be $4807. This would represent a potential increase of around 15%. The Relative Strength Index is near 30, suggesting that Ethereum may be oversold. The 10-day Simple Moving Average is approximately $3383, indicating upward momentum. These factors hint that bulls might be influencing the market, and Ethereum could see further growth ahead.

For those interested, Ethereum can be accessed on platforms like ChangeNOW without registration and hidden fees.

>>> ChangeNOW – Swap Crypto Simple, Fast, Free of Custody <<<

Solana Nearing Support Levels Amid Potential Market Rebound

Solana (SOL) has seen a recent decline, trading between $205 and $239. In the past week, its price dropped over 20%, and it’s down about 24% this month. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) is around 26, suggesting the cryptocurrency is oversold. With support at $187 and resistance at $255, a reversal could see SOL targeting higher levels like $289, which would be a notable percentage increase from current prices. Some market indicators point towards possible growth.

Solana is available for purchase on platforms like ChangeNOW, offering services without registration and hidden fees.

>>> ChangeNOW – Swap Crypto Simple, Fast, Free of Custody <<<

Conclusion

Ethereum and Solana present distinct opportunities for investors and traders. Ethereum remains a dominant platform for decentralized applications, offering reliability and a wide ecosystem. Solana offers faster transaction speeds and lower fees, appealing to users seeking efficiency.

For those considering investing in these cryptocurrencies, ChangeNOW is an excellent platform for transactions. It enables users to exchange, buy, or sell these coins without hidden fees or the need for registration.

By not storing user funds, ChangeNOW enhances security. Supporting over 900 cryptocurrencies, it imposes no limits on transaction volumes. Users can also purchase crypto using a bank card, adding to the convenience. This flexibility makes ChangeNOW a valuable resource for crypto enthusiasts.

The post Solana or Ethereum? Which Altcoin Is Better BUY as Market Take a Pause appeared first on Blockonomi.

item.content:encoded:
A bold prediction from a Wall Street veteran has sparked chatter in the crypto world. A rising digital coin is expected to leave popular tokens like SHIB and BONK in the dust with an astonishing 20,000% growth. This ambitious forecast points to a new player set to dominate the meme coin space, leaving investors eager to learn more.

DOGEN: The First Memetoken for Alpha Males Who Demand the Best

Unleash your inner alpha with DOGEN, the meme token built for those who want to live a beautiful life. DOGEN is the alpha dog that never misses a chance to win big. This is the token for winners who wonâ€™t settle for anything less. Think luxury cars, stacks of cash, and beautiful women â€” thatâ€™s the Alpha DOGEN lifestyle!

HODL Like a Boss, Conquer the Market

Ready to live like an Alpha DOGEN and enjoy the finer things in life? Itâ€™s on the runway, gearing up for a 700% takeoff by the end of the presale â€” and thatâ€™s just the start. With DOGEN, youâ€™re looking at potential thousand-fold returns as memetokens lead the hottest trend of this altcoin season.

The earlier you jump in, the more you win! It’s a deal that others will envy, and you’ll be at the top of the pack.

Missed WIF, Popcat or Ponke rise?

DOGEN is the new doggie on the Solana memetokens ground alongside BONK, WIF, and Popcat known for their astonishing 1000% growth. Currently undervalued, DOGEN is poised to take this crypto narrative to the next level, potentially breaking records in this bull run.

Community-Driven with Real Value

DOGEN isnâ€™t just a short-lived hype; itâ€™s a growing movement. The team behind DOGEN is laser-focused on building a thriving community of alpha leaders who refuse to settle for less and are geared up to dominate the market. This token offers real value, from exciting campaigns to exclusive perks for early adopters. DOGEN is an opportunity to be part of something that lasts.

DOGENâ€™s multi-level referral program is as fierce as it gets: Youâ€™ll score 7% from every token your direct bros (1st level) buy using your referral code. Plus, there are more rewards down the line â€” you can grow your profits as your referrals bring in even more users.

Hold DOGEN and let others envy you! Join the Dogen Army today and conquer the crypto world!

Shiba Inu (SHIB): A Memecoin with Broader Utility Potential

Shiba Inu (SHIB) is a DOGE-inspired cryptocurrency launched in August 2020 on the Ethereum blockchain, offering greater flexibility for applications. Created by the anonymous developer Ryoshi, it originally had 1 quadrillion tokens. Half of the supply was sent to Ethereum co-creator Vitalik Buterin, who donated a large portion to a Covid relief fund and burned 40%. SHIB’s Ethereum integration allows for projects like ShibaSwap, a decentralized exchange, and future plans for NFTs and DAO governance. This utility potential, combined with its community-driven nature, distinguishes SHIB from other memecoins. Its attractiveness in the market depends on future development and adoption of its ecosystem-focused applications.

 

BONK: A Solana-Based Memecoin Driving Community Engagement

BONK is a memecoin built on the Solana blockchain with a Shiba Inu logo. It aims to strengthen the Solana ecosystem by redistributing value to its community instead of large investors. Half of its supply was airdropped to Solana NFT and DeFi users. BONK gained over 10,000% this year and became the 3rd-largest memecoin by market cap. A Coinbase listing boosted its popularity. BONK supports decentralized applications like BonkSwap, its decentralized exchange. Its high supply and memecoin volatility remain challenges. However, its growth and integration within Solana make it an interesting option in the current cryptocurrency market. Buyers may find its focus on community and ecosystem appeal promising.

Conclusion

DOGEN stands out as the Meme Token for Alpha Males, blending luxury, success, and ambition. While SHIB and BONK show limited short-term growth, DOGEN’s 700% presale target highlights its massive potential, with room for explosive gains during this altcoin season. Backed by a strong community and real benefits, DOGEN is set to dominate its space.

Site: Dogen crypto

Twitter: https://x.com/dogenmeme

Telegram: https://t.me/Dogen_Portal

The post Wall Street Expert Tips DOGEN to Surpass SHIB and BONK With 20,000% Growth appeared first on Blockonomi.

item.description:

The post Early Retirement Dream: Invest in These Affordable Cryptos Today and Reap Rewards by 2028! appeared first on Blockonomi.
item.content:encoded:
Securing financial independence earlier than expected might be within reach. By exploring affordable cryptocurrencies available today, there’s a chance to unlock significant gains in the near future. This article delves into promising digital assets that could contribute to achieving retirement goals by 2028, offering insights into potential paths toward a more secure financial future.

Trump’s Victory Sparks Crypto Chaos: $XYZ Meme Coin Ready to Deliver a 99,900% Knockout

Donald Trumpâ€™s election victory has triggered a seismic shift in the crypto market, setting the stage for a bull run like no other. As the dust settles, major coins limp forward with uninspiring double-digit gains, while meme coins are stealing the show.

PNUTâ€™s recent 4,500% surge? FREDâ€™s 6,000% explosion? Ancient history, buried in the ashes of short-lived hype. These coins buckled under selling pressure, leaving FOMO-ridden investors licking their wounds. But the crypto battlefield doesnâ€™t wait for the weak â€” a new titan has emerged with plans to obliterate profit records and deliver an earth-shaking 99,900% surge.

Take the XYZ Side – The Undisputed Champion of Meme Coins

$XYZ Breaks into the Ring to Knockout Meme Coin Legends

Meet $XYZ – the first-ever all-sports memecoins for true crypto degens hungry for 1000X profits. This is the token for those who thrive on the thrill of competition.

As Trump takes the reins, the crypto market is set to erupt so the competition is getting fierce. Only the strongest tokens can survive in this no-mercy arena. Here comes the dawn of a crypto era for those with balls of steel â€” the guys like Joe Rogan and Dana White â€” whoâ€™d proudly rally behind Trumpâ€™s team. With such true men of business on board, there is no place for old pussy meme coins, it’s time for real brutal coins.

Fueled by the sports mentality, the $XYZ token has emerged as the ultimate contender ready to crush competitors and rocket to the moon on Elon Muskâ€™s mission. $XYZ is on its way to the winner’s podium to become a badge of honor for those who live and breathe sports and crypto.

$XYZ Already Delivers Even Before Hitting the Market

The $XYZ presale is underway, providing access to the token at a special pre-listing price.

Launch Price: $0.0001

Price Now: $0.001

In just a couple of months, $XYZ already soared over 1000%!

Next Stage: $0.001333 (+33% jump incoming)

Final Knockout Target: $0.1

From launch to the token generation event, $XYZ is targeting a mind-blowing 99,900% surge!

If youâ€™re not in, youâ€™re out. The $XYZ presale is already smashing through stages with the speed of a championâ€™s knockout blow.

Join $XYZ Presale Now and See Your Pennies Grow Into Millions!

Bitcoin (BTC)

Bitcoin, the pioneer of cryptocurrencies, is reshaping our understanding of money. Created by the mysterious Satoshi Nakamoto, it allows for direct transactions without banks. Operating on blockchain technology, Bitcoin acts like a public ledger shared across many computers. This ensures transactions are secure and transparent. Miners verify these transactions by solving complex puzzles, earning bitcoins as rewards. With a capped supply of 21 million coins, Bitcoin aims to resist inflation and fraud.

Today, Bitcoin shows strong potential in the market. The “halving” events every four years reduce miners’ rewards, increasing scarcity. This has historically boosted its value. Compared to newer cryptocurrencies, Bitcoin remains the most recognized and widely adopted. While other coins offer different features, Bitcoin’s established network keeps it leading the pack. As the world goes digital, Bitcoin’s role as a decentralized currency makes it an attractive option for the future of finance.

Ethereum (ETH)

Ethereum has transformed the blockchain world since its launch in 2015. Created by Vitalik Buterin, it introduced smart contracts and a vast ecosystem of decentralized apps (dApps). Unlike some others, Ethereum now uses Proof-of-Stake, making it more energy-efficient. It also brought us ERC-20 tokens, which many projects use for various purposes like governance and utility. With solutions like Arbitrum and Polygon, Ethereum is tackling speed and cost issues, making transactions smoother and cheaper for everyone.

In the current market, Ethereum shines due to its constant innovation. The recent shift to Proof-of-Stake with the “Merge” in 2022 was a big step forward. Upcoming upgrades like sharding aim to boost scalability and cut costs even more. While new coins come and go, few match Ethereum’s strong community and active development. Its role in decentralized finance (DeFi) and the broader crypto ecosystem makes it a key player. As trends evolve, Ethereum’s commitment to improvement and decentralization could make it an attractive choice for those looking into cryptocurrencies.

XRP (XRP)

XRP is a digital currency supported by the XRP Ledger. It’s designed to be fast, low-cost, and open, making transactions across borders quick and easy. Created by Jed McCaleb, Arthur Britto, and David Schwartz, XRP was launched with 100 billion coins. They gifted 80 billion to Ripple, a company aiming to enhance global payments. Ripple, originally called OpenCoin Inc., uses XRP to boost network liquidity and support the ecosystem. To manage the coin’s supply, Ripple placed 55 billion XRP in escrow. The name XRP comes from “ripple credits,” highlighting its goal to make moving money as simple as sending information.

In today’s crypto market, XRP stands out for its speed and efficiency. Transactions are processed in seconds without the need for a bank account, setting it apart from coins like Bitcoin, which can be slower and more expensive to transfer. XRP’s technology focuses on real-world applications, especially in cross-border payments. While the market can be unpredictable, XRP’s features and Ripple’s efforts to build partnerships might make it appealing to investors. Compared to other cryptocurrencies, XRP could be a strong contender in the push toward faster, more efficient digital transactions.

Ondo (ONDO)

Ondo Finance is reshaping finance by blending the stability of traditional assets with the efficiency of blockchain technology. By tokenizing income-generating real-world assets, it makes high-grade financial products accessible to more people. This approach enhances financial infrastructure and broadens accessibility through blockchain. Ondo operates with an asset management arm that creates tokenized financial products and a technology arm that develops decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols. Together, they boost the functionality and scalability of Ondo’s offerings.

In a market where trust and security are vital, Ondo stands out by partnering with reputable firms and emphasizing regulatory compliance. Collaborations with organizations like BlackRock and the use of secure custody solutions highlight its commitment to quality and safety. Products like OUSG, which tokenizes U.S. Treasury bonds, provide investors with stable returns backed by real assets. This focus on transparency and high disclosure standards sets Ondo apart from many other crypto projects. As the market trends towards asset-backed tokens and regulated offerings, Ondo’s unique blend of traditional finance and blockchain positions it attractively for investors seeking stable, secure opportunities in the cryptocurrency space.

Conclusion

BTC, ETH, XRP, and ONDO are promising investments in this bull run. However, XYZVerse (XYZ) offers a unique sports-meme platform aiming for 20,000% growth by 2028.

The post Are Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Dogecoin (DOGE) Going to Zero? Whales Buy More of This AI Gem Instead appeared first on Blockonomi.
item.content:encoded:
Memecoins typically pump the most during market rallies and are hit the hardest during market downturns. Following the latest correction, Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Dogecoin, the leading memecoins, tumbled, losing key price levels. But are they going to zero? Certainly not.

Instead, whales have been betting more on IntelMarkets (INTL), a new AI-DeFi gem, hoping to make the most of the current market condition. Its unique narrative as the worldâ€™s first AI-powered trading platform and massive growth prospects as a low-cap drive huge interest and demand.

IntelMarkets (INTL): New AI Gem With Huge Growth Prospects

Crypto whales are buying IntelMarkets (INTL) for several reasons, becoming a top favorite ahead of most new ICOs. As a low-cap gem, its upside potential is unmatched by most top crypto coins, Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Dogecoin (DOGE) included. Further, its novelty as the worldâ€™s first true modern-gen AI-powered crypto exchange drives a frenzy.

The listing price of the token after its scheduled listing on top exchanges like Binance and Bybit is $0.11â€”a 50% gain from the current price. This is beside the 700% gain since the presale debuted at $0.009 in the first stage, currently priced at $0.073 in the eighth round. With experts projecting a 90x gain after its launch, it might be this yearâ€™s best presale.

Equally important are its solid fundamentals, attracting whale interest. It stands at the crossroads between AI, blockchain and DeFi, offering what will be the first fully AI-powered trading platform. In addition to benefits like self-learning trading bots for optimal performance, users can trade diverse asset pairs and enjoy up to 1,000x leverageâ€”the next big thing?

Shiba Inu (SHIB): 20% Decline on the Weekly Chart

Shiba Inu (SHIB) is the leading memecoin on the Ethereum blockchainâ€”one of the best altcoins. Besides its memetic appeal, SHIBâ€™s robust ecosystem and vibrant community make it a top crypto to invest in. However, following the latest market pullback, it tumbled.

The Shiba Inu price nosedived over 20% in the past seven days, changing hands around $0.00002. This huge sell-off has been a cause for concern, although holders can draw confidence from bullish technical indicators like the 200-EMA and 200-SMA.

At the same time, experts anticipate a significant jump in its next upswing. Airdropalpha40, a crypto trader and analyst, expects a jump toward $0.00008 in the upcoming bull run. Despite the substantial growth prospects of Shiba Inu (SHIB), it pales in comparison to IntelMarketsâ€™ 90x upside potential.

Dogecoin (DOGE) Eyes Rebound After Decline

Dogecoin (DOGE) trades downward, swinging low following the latest market dip. It lost key price levels, tumbling by more than 20% on the weekly chart. The Dogecoin price hovers above $0.32 as of press time, aiming to reclaim the lost $0.4 support.

With a bounce on the cards, Dogecoin (DOGE) is one of the best coins to invest in. AzharBashirMir, a popular trader and analyst on X, suggests a rally toward $1 and $2, positioning it among the best cryptos to buy. TATrader_Alan also supports this bullish claim, forecasting a jump toward $3 to $4 this bull cycle.

Also painting a bullish picture are indicators like the Stochastic RSI Fast and Williams Percent Range (14). Reclaiming the $0.4 support will be the bullsâ€™ next target, followed by a breakout above $1. However, for significant gains, new altcoins like IntelMarkets with AI elements have more upside potential.

IntelMarkets (INTL): Outperforming Top Memes Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB)

Despite the dip in the prices of Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Dogecoin (DOGE), IntelMarkets (INTL) maintains an upward trajectory. Both retailers and whales are attracted to its innovative approach to trading and massive growth prospects, pushing it above $5 million in presale. As it prepares for what might be an explosive debut, it is a new DeFi project to bet on.

For more information about IntelMarkets (INTL) visit the links below:

Buy Presale

Website

Telegram

item.content:encoded:
Significant shifts are unfolding in the cryptocurrency arena as Dogwifhat and Avalanche continue their ascent. Yet, it’s the astonishing 6,900% surge of XYZVerse that is capturing attention, hinting at a potential game-changer for early 2025. This unexpected development is stirring curiosity and speculation about its impact on the digital asset landscape.

Score Big with XYZ: The New Meme Coin Heavyweight

The fans are losing it! The XYZ token is in the crypto ring, landing blows on the competition â€“ bullshit coins, worthless farming schemes, and scam projects. Like a true champ, this first-ever all-sports meme token has fought its way through the bear market with fearless momentum and shows no signs of slowing down. With eyes set on a roaring 9,900% growth, XYZ is destined to leave the 2024 meme coin triumphants like BOME and WIF trailing in its wake.

Own the field, earn while the crowd plays

XYZ is more than just a benchwarmer in the meme coin game; itâ€™s creating the ultimate playing field with XYZVerse, where the thrill of sports meets the energy of meme culture. With a roadmap equipped with entertainment dApps, prediction markets, and sports betting options, XYZ is poised to draw in millions of gamblers ready to join the action.

Remember Polymarket’s massive $1 billion trading volume during the US election betting fever? XYZ is gearing up for an even bigger win in the GameFi arena, letting its stakeholders cash in on the perfect combo of meme coin vibes, sports hype, and crypto mass adoption.

Missed meme coin supercycle?

By capitalizing on the ever-expanding gambling niche, XYZ is set to become the G.O.A.T of meme coins. BOMEâ€™s 5,000% takeoff and WIFâ€™s 1,000% year-to-date rally are now relics of the past because XYZ is set to explode by over 9,900% from its current price by the TGE and outshine its sensational predecessors. Get in the game early to secure your spot â€“ currently undervalued, XYZ is going the distance to break new records!

Rallying the community, securing the win

XYZVerse will be the MVP in this bull run, giving the community the control to call the plays and steer the ecosystem’s direction. Active contributors will receive airdropped XYZ tokens as a reward for their dedication. With rock-solid tokenomics and plans for both CEX/DEX listings, XYZ is positioned for a championship run, ensuring a steady revenue flow and consistent token burns to keep the scoreboard in favor of a strong price and a thriving community.

>>The XYZ presale is live â€“ donâ€™t miss out on this knockout 9,900% opportunity!<<

Dogwifhat (WIF)

WIF has experienced significant fluctuations recently, with its price ranging between $2.38 and $3.52. In the past week, the coin’s value dropped by 31.03%, and over the last month, it declined by 39.02%. Despite these short-term decreases, WIF has shown resilience over the past six months, gaining 19.71%, which suggests potential for long-term growth.

The technical indicators hint at possible future movements. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) stands at 28.61, indicating that the coin is currently oversold and might be poised for a rebound. The price is approaching a key support level at $1.91. If this support holds, WIF could bounce back toward the nearest resistance at $4.19, representing a substantial increase from current levels.

Moving averages also provide insights into WIF’s trend. The 10-day Simple Moving Average is $2.24, while the 100-day SMA is $2.62. A crossover could signal a shift in momentum. Additionally, the MACD level is at -0.0740, suggesting that bearish momentum may be waning. Traders are watching to see if WIF will rally or if it will test the second support level at $0.7749.

Avalanche (AVAX)

Avalanche (AVAX) has experienced notable price changes recently. In the past week, its price fell by 18.86%, marking a significant short-term decline. However, over the past month, AVAX gained 10.91%, indicating a positive trend. Looking at the last six months, the price increased by 43.24%, demonstrating substantial growth in the medium term.

The current price ranges from $42.59 to $57.15. The nearest resistance level is $63.55, while the nearest support is at $34.42. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) stands at 27.18, suggesting that the token is oversold and may be due for a rebound. The 10-day Simple Moving Average is $41.95, which is below the 100-day SMA of $47.35, hinting at potential upward movement. If AVAX breaks through the resistance at $63.55, it could target the next level at $78.12, representing a significant increase.

Based on these indicators, AVAX may be set for a price rise. The oversold RSI and stochastic levels point to a possible upward correction. If the price holds above the support at $34.42 and gains momentum, it might reach higher resistance levels. The MACD level of -1.1796 also suggests potential for a trend reversal. Overall, the data points to growth potential for AVAX in the near future.

Conclusion

While WIF and AVAX perform well, XYZVerse’s all-sport memecoin aims for 20,000% growth, blending sports and meme culture, potentially reshaping the market in Q1 2025.

item.content:encoded:
The crypto market is buzzing with anticipation as the winter of 2024/2025 approaches. Three altcoins are emerging as potential game-changers, poised to make significant impacts during the upcoming altcoin season. This article explores these standout digital assets, unveiling what makes them candidates for explosive growth. Discover the tokens that could lead the next wave in the cryptocurrency landscape.

The All-Sports Meme Token You Canâ€™t Afford to Bench!

XYZ is your exclusive VIP pass to a sports-driven, meme-fueled revolution. Think of it as the MVP of the XYZVerse ecosystem, where degens can score big off the growing demand for meme coins

Â Picture this: Polymarket hitting $1 billion in trading volume during the US presidential election â€“ now throw in the hype of meme coins and the thrill of sports betting. With millions of sports fans ready to hit the field and cash in the XYZVerse ecosystem is set to keep expanding â€“ and your rewards will slam dunk through the roof!

>>>XYZ presale is your first-quarter chance to get in before the mind-blowing explosion!<<<

In 2024, meme coins are the undisputed champions of the crypto world, and XYZ is set to crush the competition. With potential thousand-fold returns that will blow past the finish line, the presale plan draws a hefty 9,900% growth by the TGE. Forget about BOMEâ€™s 5,000% rise or WIFâ€™s 1,000% rally â€“ XYZ is here to outscore them all!

With upcoming listings on major CEX and DEX platforms, rock-solid defense in the form of audited smart contracts, and a fully vetted team, XYZ is already ahead of the game. The first-mover advantage is key here â€“ get in before the crowd storms the field, and youâ€™ll be sitting on way bigger returns!

>>Donâ€™t be left on the bench â€“ grab your XYZ tokens now and be part of the next massive crypto championship!<<

Sui (SUI)

Sui is a groundbreaking blockchain platform designed for global adoption. It offers a secure, powerful, and scalable environment for developers. At its core, Sui uses a novel object-centric data model and the secure Move programming language. This innovative approach addresses inefficiencies found in other blockchain systems. By focusing on user experience, Sui removes common barriers in blockchain interactions. Features like zkLogin, sponsored transactions, and programmable transaction blocks make Web3 applications more accessible and friendly.

Sui’s potential lies in its strong technical foundation and commitment to usability. By simplifying blockchain interactions, it stands out in a crowded market. Compared to other platforms, Sui’s focus on the end user could give it an edge. In the current market, there is a demand for user-friendly and scalable solutions. While many coins compete on technology alone, Sui combines this with a dedication to accessibility. This approach may position it well as the blockchain space continues to evolve. Considering market trends, platforms like Sui that prioritize both innovation and user experience may attract more attention.

Pepe (PEPE)

PEPE is a new cryptocurrency launched on Ethereum that pays tribute to the famous Pepe the Frog meme created by Matt Furie in the early 2000s. It’s a deflationary memecoin with a catchy theme and a straightforward approach. Unlike other complicated projects, PEPE embraces its meme roots and keeps things pure and simple. There’s no utility promised, and the team is upfront about it. They appeal to the crypto community by having no transaction taxes and focusing purely on being a fun and engaging token.

In late April to May 2023, PEPE saw an explosive surge that pushed its market cap to a staggering $1.6 billion. Early investors saw massive gains, turning some into millionaires overnight. This surge sparked what many call a “memecoin season,” with other meme-based tokens experiencing wild price swings. PEPE’s roadmap includes plans to get listed on major exchanges and aims for a “meme takeover.” While it’s uncertain if PEPE and other memecoins will reach new highs, many in the crypto community are hopeful, especially with the upcoming Bitcoin halving cycle. In a market where memes can drive value, PEPE stands out as an attractive coin for those looking to ride the next big wave.

Conclusion

SUI and PEPE offer exciting prospects this season, but XYZVerse (XYZ) stands out with its sports-meme fusion, community focus, and ambitious growth targets.
